name: Insignia 55" F50 Series 4K UHD Smart Fire TV (NS-55F501NA26)
pros: Simple setup and user-friendly Fire TV interface
Includes HDMI eARC for high-quality audio passthrough
Good selection of ports including composite for older devices
Solid 4K picture quality for the price
cons: Mixed user reports on reliability and screen glitches/flickering
Sound quality is a common criticism; external speakers recommended
Limited to basic HDR10 support (no Dolby Vision or HDR10+)
Performance and menu navigation can be slow/laggy according to some users
